description: Conservation Area Consent application in connection with the demolition of the metro bar public house (Class A4) and the erection of a part 8, part 12 storey building (reaching a maximum height of 40 metres), to provide 260mÂ² of flexible class A1 and / or A2 and / or A3 and / or A4 and / or A5 floor space at ground floor level, 138 hotel rooms and 36 hotel apartment lets on upper levels, together with associated works (Full planning application ref: P092307 also submitted).
decision_conditions: REASON: The proposed demolition, in the absence of an appropriate scheme of redevelopment, would fail to preserve or enhance the character and appearance of the St Mary Magdalene Conservation Area. The proposal is therefore contrary to PPS5; policies: 4B.11 and 4B.12 of the London Plan 2008; policy D21 of the Islington Unitary Development Plan 2002; and Conservation Area Design Guidelines (2002).
